Topic: Indian markets spooked on gains in US Treasury Bond Yields: What should investors do now?
Statement: Morgan Stanley^ in a recent note^ highlighted that over the last 20 years^ there have been four major rising long bond yield cycles. Each one of them have been positively correlated to equity prices – i.e.^ rising yields and rising share prices.

Topic: Everyone makes mistakes^ remember these 7 secrets of successful selling
